title: Why the Family of an NFL Player Is Suing a Real Housewives Star
description: She lost her only son, a former N.F.L. player. A settlement would have provided some solace, but even that was taken away.
dc:creator: Jenny Vrentas and Morgan Lieberman
media:description: Photos of Chuck Osborne, who played football at the University of Arizona and in the N.F.L., are displayed in the home of his mother, Kathleen Bajgrowicz.
